castVote(uint256,address).details: Allows a player to cast a vote against another player.

params.target: The address of the player being voted against.

commitMove(uint256,string).details: Allows a player to submit a commitment for their move.

createGame(bytes,bytes32,address[],uint2.details: Creates a new Zk-Werewolf game instance.

params.adminPublicKey: The admin's public key for off-chain encryption.
params.numWerewolves: The number of werewolves in the game.
params.players: An array of all player addresses.
params.userAddressesHash: A hash of all player addresses.
params.userRoleCommitments: An array of commitments for each player's role.

returns._0: The ID of the newly created game.

endTurn(uint256).details: Ends the current turn. This function is for signalling and clearing state. The actual events of the turn are reported by the admin.

endVote(uint256).details: Ends the current voting session and tallies the votes. Only the game admin can call this function.

reportEndOfTurnEvents(uint256,address[],.details: Allows the admin to report the events of the turn, such as players killed or werewolves discovered.

params.gameOverReached: A boolean indicating if the game has ended.
params.playersKilled: Array of players to be marked as killed.
params.werewolvesDiscovered: Array of werewolves to be marked as discovered.
params.werewolvesWon: A boolean indicating if werewolves won.

startVote(uint256).details: Starts a new voting session for a game.
